artist: Artist: David Tremlett; Publisher: Shiraishi Contemporary Art, Tokyo
description: softcover book bound with staples; cover has photographic image of a bunker with orange, yellow, green, brown, and red color splotches; black and white photographic images alternating with pages of printed designs on orange and yellow paper; bound volume; lender's archive # 34
image_copyright: © David Tremlett %2F Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C New York
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis
signed: Signed in pencil by the artist on first page: [For Bill │ David Tremlett │ 2005]
title: Material for Walls
